%md ## Finding connected components _A **subgraph** is a graph whose vertices are a subset of the vertex set of the original graph and whose edges are a subset of the edge set of the original graph._ _A **connected component** is a subgraph in which any two vertices are connected to each other by an edge or a series of edges._ The connected components algorithm labels each connected component of the graph with the ID of its lowest-numbered vertex. Consider the following data set:

Follower Followee
John Pat
Pat Dave
Gary Chris
Chris Bill

The preceding data is a simple one with six vertices and two clusters. Let's put this data in the form of two lists: _verticesList_ and _edgesList_. The following is the content of _verticesList_: 1,John 2,Pat 3,Dave 4,Gary 5,Chris 6,Bill The following is the content of _edgesList_: 1,2,follows 2,3,follows 4,5,follows 5,6,follows A connected component algorithm is expected to identify two clusters, the first one identified by (1,John) and the second by (4,Gary).

Finding connected components

A subgraph is a graph whose vertices are a subset of the vertex set of the original graph and whose edges are a subset of the edge set of the original graph.

A connected component is a subgraph in which any two vertices are connected to each other by an edge or a series of edges.

The connected components algorithm labels each connected component of the graph with the ID of its lowest-numbered vertex.

Consider the following data set:

Follower Followee
John Pat
Pat Dave
Gary Chris
Chris Bill

The preceding data is a simple one with six vertices and two clusters. Let's put this data in the
form of two lists: verticesList and edgesList.

The following is the content of verticesList:

1,John
2,Pat
3,Dave
4,Gary
5,Chris
6,Bill

The following is the content of edgesList:

1,2,follows
2,3,follows
4,5,follows
5,6,follows

A connected component algorithm is expected to identify two clusters, the first one
identified by (1,John) and the second by (4,Gary).

paragraphs.text:
%spark

val vRdd = sc.parallelize(Array(
    (1L,"John"),
    (2L,"Pat"),
    (3L,"Dave"),
    (4L,"Gary"),
    (5L,"Chris"),
    (6L,"Bill")
))

val eRdd = sc.parallelize(Array(
    Edge(1L,2L,"follows"),
    Edge(2L,3L,"follows"),
    Edge(4L,5L,"follows"),
    Edge(5L,6L,"follows")
))

val graph = Graph(vRdd, eRdd)

graph.vertices.collect.foreach(println)
graph.edges.collect.foreach(println)

val cc = graph.connectedComponents

val ccVertices = cc.vertices

ccVertices.collect.foreach(println)
